“I always select Wick & Associates for every company I invest in!”

“I have known Steve Wick for nearly 20 years. Prior to meeting Steve, I had trouble receiving timely and accurate monthly financial statements from my accountant. Since being with Steve and his company, I have appreciated the expertise and commitment to excellence. I always select Wick & Associates for every company I invest in.”

– Lance Johnson

“Undoubtedly saved us tons of money!”

“Our main objective in finding a CPA is that they understand the running of a small business and provide ways to save money. I was impressed with Steve Wick when he visited our company, and after we initially contracted with him. He and his staff have gone so far as dropping off paperwork instead of mailing it. I enjoy that level of personal touch. Steve has settled my concerns as a small-business operator and has undoubtedly saved us tons of money. He spends the required time and goes the extra mile to learn the business and explain the aspects of the specific company’s tax requirements. ”

– Emmanuello Sotiropoulou
Vice President, Prometheus Applied Technologies

“He and his staff have always been friendly, approachable, responsive and proactive!”

“During our search for a trustworthy accountant, we were very concerned about someone who would just provide generic information that was not specific to our business. We wanted to make sure our CPA was able to focus their efforts on our unique needs. We found Steve Wick to be assertive at finding the best benefits both in our tax preparation and our daily financial planning to help us be as competitive in our field as possible. He and his staff have always been friendly, approachable, responsive and proactive. I happily give him our fullest endorsement to anyone who needs a full service accountant. As a longtime customer, there service has never fallen off.”

– Sharon Lazarowicz
Vice President, Pinnacle Electric

“He has saved us thousands of dollars with practical financial advice and sound business practices!”

“When I first hired Steven Wick as our CPA, I wasn’t sure that he knew enough about my type of business to be an effective planner. I found, however, that he was willing to do whatever it took to service my company. He even took a class to better understand my individual tax needs. Over the duration of our relationship, I believe that he has saved us thousands of dollars with practical financial advice and sound business practices. I also appreciate all the extra help and time that he takes to walk me through situations when I am confused. I have had several CPA’s and PA’s in the past and never felt like I got the service that I was paying for.”

– Peggy Johnson
Owner, Severance Self Storage

“Business owners need trustworthy help in becoming successful and Steve Wick makes the difference!”

“I expect my accountant to understand my business and my abilities. I leave it to them to pick up the slack for my weaknesses. Steve Wick has been one of the best choices for aid in running my business, supporting as a true partnership relation. I enjoy that I am able to call him at any time and get answers on critical decisions within my business. More than anything, working with Steve gives me peace of mind, allowing me to do what I do best, directing the business, and knowing that the books are clean. His staff has a true concern to make their customers successful. Most business owners need trustworthy help in becoming successful and Steve Wick makes the difference.”

– Harvey Russell
President, Ruush Envelopes

“Highly recommend Steve Wick & Associates to everyone!”

“We were originally trying to do all of our accounting using Quickbooks. As a contractor, we found that QB wasn’t able to give us the advanced accounting practices that we needed to run a successful business. Although it is a great bookkeeping tool, Steve Wick was able to help us analyze our books and make better financial decisions. One of the biggest successes we have had since working with Steve is his counsel on moving into an Accrual Based Accounting system. We thank them for all their help with our daily bookkeeping and highly recommend Steve Wick & Associates to everyone!”

– Arnold Drennen
President, Drennen Custom Contracting
